title: Donkey Milk Candy Milkshake
instructions: Step 1. In a double boiler, place 4 tablespoons of milk and 12 units of the candy. Heat for about 5 minutes.
Step 2. Remove from heat, transfer to a blender, and process until the candy is completely crushed. Set aside in a glass.
Step 3. In a blender jar, add the ice cubes, ice cream, cup of evaporated milk, and the donkey milk candy sauce. Blend well.
Step 4. Serve in a glass. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle with candy pieces.
